thread.title: MasterChef Junior seeks H-Town's best young cooks
thread.title_full: MasterChef Junior seeks H-Town's best young cooks - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: MasterChef Junior seeks H-Town's best young cooks
text:
Image 1 of / 2 2 "MasterChef Junior" judges: Pastry chef Christina Tosi, host Gordon Ramsay, and chef Graham Elliot. "MasterChef Junior" judges: Pastry chef Christina Tosi, host Gordon Ramsay, and chef Graham Elliot. Image 2 of 2 Willie Mike, 25, of Houston, is grilled by host Gordon Ramsay during a cooking competition on the premiere of season 5 of Fox's hit reality show MasterChef. MASTERCHEF: L-R: Contestant Willie and Chef Ramsay on MASTERCHEF airing Monday, June 2 (8:00-9:00 PM ET/PT) on FOX. CR: Greg Gayne / FOX. Copyright 2014 / FOX. Willie Mike, 25, of Houston, is grilled by host Gordon Ramsay during a cooking competition on the premiere of season 5 of Fox's hit reality show MasterChef. MASTERCHEF: L-R: Contestant Willie and Chef Ramsay ... more MasterChef Junior seeks H-Town's best young cooks 1 / 2 Back to Gallery MasterChef Junior is sending its scouts to Houston to find the cityâ€™s most talented kids.
To qualify, kids must be between the ages of 8 and 13 as of April 1, 2016.
The open call is 9 a.m.-5 p.m. Nov. 14 at the Four Seasons Hotel, 1300 Lamar. To apply, go to masterchefjunior.com .
Other open casting calls for MasterChef Junior will be held in Boston, Chicago, Los Angeles, Birmingham and New York City.
The fourth season of the reality cooking competition, which is hosted by Gordon Ramsay, will debut Nov. 6 on Fox.
Browse the slideshow above to see Houston chefs and restaurants featured on the small screen.
